title: The Near-Deads
description: A short suspense story...Emily Swann, a young and motivated journalist, drags her cameraman, Benny, to take an exclusive look into the world of Dr. Stein and his private clinic, hidden in the middle of the countryside.All his patients have been clinically dead and revived, yet none seem to be acting like they have been given a second chance at life. Benny, feeling uneasy in his surroundings, keeps filming whilst Emily and Dr. Stein develop further their strange and almost instant bond.Why does Emily have such an interest in this place?For the near-deads, there is never a happy ending.
author: Jams N. Roses
